title: Please help find the font.
content:
Hello everyone. A very long time looking for this font, could you help me? If anyone knows, please tell me what this font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015160608im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5736.jpg)
author: monkpwnz

comments.content:
OK, I'll help.

Post your question on the right forum, where people who both know & care frequent.

[http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015160608/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

Hi,

I am sure this will help you definetly to find the font of text image.

You just need to go to this URL - [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015160608/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/ "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/")
I tried to look at this site. The font used on the image, finds.

Hi,  
I'm in a time crunch and need to know what font this is. Can anyone help? Nothing showed up on "findafont.com", "identifont.com", and "my fonts.com." Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015160608im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SantaFeTypeToIdentify_4761.jpg)

Hi agconnor , best if you start a new thread in Type ID Board for your for Santa Fe Trail font ID request.  
Don
